action.text: Amendment SA 4 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 63. Record Vote Number: 68.
Amendment SA 4 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S923) To require a certification.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Rubio.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 63. Record Vote Number: 68.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 63. Record Vote Number: 68.
